mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address} )
